wikipedia_page.main: Mik Thongraya (Thai: มิกค์ ทองระย้า; born 28 November 1992) is a Thai actor and model. Currently, he is signed under Channel 7.

response: * Mick Tongraya (born 1992), Thai actor and model

Bow started her career by attending Smart Kids Contest in 2004. Later in 2010 she debut as a singer under Kamikaze Record as a member of Kiss Me Five, where she debut with Kitty Chicha, Bam Pakakanya, Gail Natcha and Mild Krittiya. When the group disbanded in 2013, she joined Thai Supermodel Contest in 2013 and won it.http://tsm.ch7.com/detail/53550//สาวน้อยวัย_17_ปีเมลดา_สุศรี.html/สาวน้อยวัย_17_ปีเมลดา_สุศรี.html She later signed with Channel 7 and started her acting gig in the drama Khat Chueak, where she was paired up with Mick Tongraya. However, her second drama Yai Kanlaya, where she was paired up with Michael Pataradet aired first and made both of them become famous and tied as "Koojin" (Fantasy Couple). She won various awards during her time in Channel 7.
** Mick Tongraya for มนตร์กาลบันดาลรัก (Mon Kan Bandan Rak) (Channel 7 HD)
** "แรงดึงดูดของความรัก (Raeng Deung Dut Khong Khwam Rak)" by Peechaya Wattanamontree & Mick Tongraya from Saphai Imphot (Channel 7 HD)
